repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript contains a commentary on the Viṣṇusahasranāma. A note before the front folio says "Sahasranāmabhāṣya Stotrabhāṣya Parāśarabhaṭṭa Grantha 210 pages 8 lines injured."

msItem.title: Sahasranāmabhāṣya
msItem.author: Parāśara bhaṭṭa
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 mane . yadā (1 illegible) [ṣyāyaṇā)] vedā mahābhāratapañcamāḥ jāto lakṣmaṇamiśrasaṃ (gap of a few syllables) 1v 2 (gap of a few syllables) bhartrā svayaṃ .. śrīśrīraṅgapatiprasādatṛṣayā śrīraṅganāthāvhayaḥ śrīraṅge (gap of a few syllables) 1v 3 (gap of a few syllables) ṇḍito bhagavati prāgeva bhūyaḥ ka[lau] pūrṇamanyatame jane śrutiśirogu (gap of a few syllables) 1v 4 (gap of a few syllables) stāvubhau visa [kāruṇiko] hariśca tadidaṃ maurkhyaṃ sahetāṃ mama [ārthe?] (gap of a few syllables)
msItem.explicit: [105v] 6 (ti?) evaṃ sarvato mukhe praśāsate kvacit kutaścit pratihato parājitaḥ yathā dāśārha ma [105]v 7 va janārddanaḥ haristrailokya nāthassan kintu tasya na nirjjitamiti ca svarāsate ba sarvandevatāntaramavima

support.p: Thin palm leaf is used as guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Foliation is lost due to injured folio.

additions.desc: Front blank folio has title Sahasranāmabhāṣya written in Granth script.

listBibl.bibl: Śrī Viṣṇusahasranāma with the bhāṣya of Parāśara bhaṭṭar with translation in English by Prof. A SrinivAsa Raghavan published by Vishishtadvaita Pracarini Sabha Mylapore Madras 600004 1983

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Square brackets and question marks are used for dobtful reading.
